description: Non material amendment to planning permission 19/00977/HOU (Demolition of existing garage and erection of single storey side and rear extension and a new wall) as amended by 19/02117/NMA  to install solar panels on flat roof
decision_conditions: The Council considers the amendments to be non-material and as such, it is recommended that the S96A application for a non-material amendment to be granted

Your attention is drawn to the need to comply with the relevant provisions of the Building Regulations, the Building Acts and other related legislation. These cover such works as - the demolition of existing buildings, the erection of a new building or structure, the extension or alteration to a building, change of use of buildings, installation of services, underpinning works, and fire safety/means of escape works. Notice of intention to demolish existing buildings must be given to the Council's Building Control Service at least 6 weeks before work starts. A completed application form together with detailed plans must be submitted for approval before any building work is commenced.
Thank you for your email. Please could you kindly send confirmation of the £34 having been paid, as we have only received the confirmation that £1 has been paid as an additional fee

Inspection:Site inspection carried out in person on 16/11/2023.Site inspection carried out as a desktop exercise with information provided by the applicant as supporting material to application.Assessment:Minor works to small trees with no adverse impact upon public amenity or tree health.Recommendation:Approve.
